title: ADAS Warning Light or Message On
symptom_short: ADAS features disabled or warning message displayed

likely_causes.cause: Camera or radar sensor blocked (dirt, snow, ice)
Sensor misalignment after windshield replacement or impact
ADAS control module fault or calibration required

recommended_checks: Clean windshield area in front of camera and front radar emblem.
Check for recent windshield replacement or front-end repairs.
Scan ADAS module for calibration or fault codes.
safety_warning: ADAS is an assistance system, not a replacement for attentive driving.

title: Lane Keep Assist Not Working
symptom_short: Lane keeping or lane departure warning not functioning

likely_causes.cause: Camera view obstructed or poor lane markings
Vehicle speed below system operating threshold

recommended_checks: Verify lane markings are visible and speed is sufficient.
Check settings to ensure feature is enabled.
safety_warning: Lane assist may disengage unexpectedly—always maintain steering control.

title: Adaptive Cruise Control Not Available
symptom_short: Adaptive cruise control will not engage
recommended_checks: Inspect and clean front radar area.
Check for recent front bumper repairs.
safety_warning: Adaptive cruise may disengage without warning—be prepared to brake manually.

title: Blind Spot Monitoring Not Working
symptom_short: Blind spot indicators do not illuminate

likely_causes.cause: Rear radar sensors blocked or dirty
Rear bumper repair or sensor misalignment

recommended_checks: Check for trailer hitch or accessories blocking sensors.
Scan for blind spot module codes.
safety_warning: Blind spot systems assist only—always check mirrors and shoulder.

title: Automatic Emergency Braking Disabled
symptom_short: AEB system disabled or warning displayed

likely_causes.cause: Camera/radar sensor obstruction or calibration issue
Multiple ADAS faults triggering system shutdown

recommended_checks: Scan for ADAS and braking system codes.
Perform calibration if required by manufacturer.
safety_warning: Without AEB, collision risk increases—drive with extra caution.
